title: CipherForge: Build Your Own Encryption Algorithm

learning_outcomes: Set up a professional Git repository with proper licensing and documentation
Understand ASCII encoding and character manipulation with ord() and chr()
Design and implement character substitution ciphers (Phase 1)
Apply transposition techniques to scramble character positions (Phase 2)
Create password-based encryption with variable key-dependent shifts (Phase 3)

Design your own unique encryption layer (Phase 5 Wild Card)
